TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DnsPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class DnsPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 指定要求網域名稱伺服器 (Domain Name Server) 中資訊的使用權限。

span.span: Specifies permission to request information from Domain Name Servers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所宣告的安全性資訊屬性目標的類別的中繼資料內儲存套用。The security information declared by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which the is applied. 系統會存取這項資訊在執行階段。The system then accesses this information at run time. 傳遞至建構函式決定允許的 DNS 為目標。The that is passed to the constructor determines the allowable DNS targets. 這些安全性屬性只用於[宣告式安全性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8)。These security attributes are used only for [Declarative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8). 如[命令式安全性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27)，使用對應類別。For [Imperative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27), use the corresponding class. 安全性存取權限完全限制，或完全不受限制。Security access is either fully restricted or fully unrestricted. 設定屬性`true`授與存取權，或`false`為沒有存取權。Set the property to `true` to grant access, or `false` for no access. 為具名參數，設定此屬性。Set this property as a named parameter. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用套用宣告式安全性的自訂類別。The following example uses to apply declarative security to a custom class. [!code-cpp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞給這個建構函式的值會指定允許目標。The value that is passed to this constructor specifies the allowable targets. ## Examples 下列範例會使用套用宣告式安全性的自訂類別。The following example uses to apply declarative security to a custom class. [!code-cpp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

summary.span: 建立並傳回 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.
A that corresponds to the security declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CreatePermission`由安全性系統，不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫方法。The `CreatePermission` method is called by the security system, not by application code. 所描述的安全性資訊屬性目標的類別的中繼資料內儲存套用。The security information described by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 然後系統會存取在執行的階段和呼叫資訊。The system then accesses the information at run time and calls . 系統會使用傳回以強制執行指定的安全性需求。The system uses the returned to enforce the specified security requirements.
